name: Tuna Pasta Salad with Egg
author: Keri
summary: This is an Italian recipe, very nice for the summer months! It has cucumber in it, which I don't like, but my husband does, so I just add cucumber to his individual portion.
ingredients: 1 (7 ounce) can tuna, drained and flaked
½  red bell pepper, finely chopped
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add penne and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes
Place penne in a large mixing bowl and toss well with olive oil
Combine tuna, mayonnaise, lemon juice, and capers in the bowl of a food processor; blend until smooth and creamy
Add to the penne and mix until well combined
Add corn, bell pepper, and cucumber and toss together
